abstract: The online program, called Upliv, offers stress analysis, weekly sessions that teach relaxation strategies and toiletries with scents.
snippet: The online program, called Upliv, offers stress analysis, weekly sessions that teach relaxation strategies and toiletries with scents.
lead_paragraph: ABOUT a decade ago, when Johnson & Johnson, whose baby products include powders, oils and diaper rash creams, was conducting focus groups, marketers noticed that mothers would bring up not just what to put on their babies’ skin, but also what got under their own.

headline.main: Stress Relief Online, Aromatherapy by Mail
headline.print_headline: Stress Relief Online, Aromatherapy by Mail
